title: (x) Kabuki costume - Codex (Calligraphic 421 BT) {Mike F}
content:
Can anyone help me find a font that looks like this?   
 ![KabukiCostume.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080521145100im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/2517.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Computer game font - Plasmatic {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080521145100/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2011 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Scoreboard font - Dig 1 & 2 {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080521145100/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dragonfly

comments.content:
the 'K' has been modified, but that is definitely Calligraphic 421 BT (Bitstream). You can view and test drive it here:   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/FontFamily207.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080521145100/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily207.html)   
   
 Mike

Dear Mike,   
I love you!   
Thanks!
